ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: So far, the equivalent quested items are more theoretical than anything else. My guild has farmed Plane of Gimps to the point where they are bored - and we
ygData.messageBody:
So far, the equivalent quested items are more "theoretical" than anything
else.

My guild has farmed Plane of Gimps to the point where they are bored - and
we got a pile of loots. Even folks who didn't want the factions came in to
loot after everyone else who fought and took faction hits got loots. We
tried to kill giants and get the corroded stuff but it never dropped (we got
one set of boots made iirc.) Look on the spoiler sites and you see that no
quested armor items are getting reported - it's far easier to kill stuff in
PoG.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 10:28 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling


It is my understanding that every item that drops in the PoG is also
questable there (I could be wrong). I am personally a follower of
Quellious, so I dont have any specific restrictions (other than roleplaying
ones) about hunting in the PoG.

Lago
